messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hi, I'm on Ware Street in Cambridge, and the house number is 17.
Which street?
Sorry, it's 17 Ware Street.
Got it. What's the phone number you're calling from?
I'm calling from my cell phone.
Can you tell me exactly what happened?
I don't know exactly. There's an older woman here who saw two gentlemen trying to get into a house at 17 Ware Street. They broke the screen door and finally got in.
Do you think they might have been breaking in?
I don't know. They might have been, but they pushed the door in. The screen part of the front door was cut.
Did you see if they used a key or anything to open the door?
I didn't see a key. I was a little away from the door, but they did push their way in.
Do you know if they're still in the house?
Yes, they're still in the house, I believe.
Can you describe the individuals?
There were two larger men. One looked kind of Hispanic, but I'm not really sure about the other one. I only saw him from a distance.
Are you standing outside?
Yes, I'm standing outside.
All right, police are on the way. Can you meet them when they get there? What's your name?
Yeah, my name is <name>. I'll wait for them.
Thank you. Stay safe. Police will be there shortly.
Okay. Thank you.
